text: The Wəlastəkwewiyik or Maliseet or Malecite were a Native American group of people of the Northeastern Woodlands. They spoke Algonquian and were a First Nation. They were part of the Wabanaki Confederacy. The region includes Quebec, New Brunswick and parts of Maine. Houlton Band of Maliseet Indians of Maine is a federally recognized Maliseet tribe in the United States. It is considered one the first foreign allies of the United States. == Maliseet Communities == * Maine, United States ** Houlton Band of Maliseet Indians (Metaksonekiyak Wolastoqewiyik)Passamaquoddy-Maliseet Language Portal - "Metaksonekiyak: on or along Meduxnekeag River (Maine and New Brunswick); in the territory of the Houlton Band of Maliseets * New Brunswick, Canada ** Kingsclear First Nation (Pilick Wəlastəkwewiyik)Girard, Camil, and Carl Brisson.
